oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Adaptive training of artificial neural network
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KHAPARDE, SA
PARNERKAR, A
HIREMATH, NS
SHESHAPRASAD, BJ
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: backpropagation
feedforward neural nets
optimisation
power system harmonics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Adaptive training of a neural network for nonstationary processes is reported within the framework of a multilayer perceptron model using the backpropagation (BP) algorithm. The error introduced by small changes in system parameters is reflected to adapt the changes in the converged weight matrix. The error is minimized using a constrained optimization method like the gradient projection method (GPM). The method is applied for harmonic prediction in voltage waveforms. The results for a sample system are discussed.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Tencon'92: Proceedings of the IEEE Region 10 International Conference on Technology Enabling Tomorrow : Computers, Communications and Automation towards the 21st Century (V 1), Melbourne, Australia, 11-13 November 1992, 525-529
